column4: hey guys. I am running into problems when trying to install guifications. I've searched for libnotify, libpurple, guifications and all related -dev packages on synaptic and installed them all. everything runs fine after the './configure' command, but when i type make and hit enter, this is what i got: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/54084/
because the file (itself) tells me to do that
not a reason to do that
you mean that there is a deb and -ready-to-install vesion of it on the universal repo?
i gave you the package name
hold on im checking this out
sudo apt-get install pidgin-guifications or go into synaptic andd search for that.
all this time trying to get it installed myself and it is available [pidgin plugins] >_<
